mapper.insert: insert into voucher_record (order_id, operation_num, voucher_num, gmt_create) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voucherNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
